title: Change Investment Allocation in a Variable Annuity
description: A contract holder wants to change their future contribution allocation to be more aggressive.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and their current allocation for new premiums.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer and their current investment choices.

tasks.description: Take the customer's new allocation instructions (e.g., 80% equity fund, 20% international fund).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the new desired allocation.

tasks.description: Update the future premium allocation in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the investment instructions for all future payments.
